other_tests.findings: Subnormal cortisol results in the first test; normal cortisol values in the second test.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normal cortisol values in the second test indicate sufficient adrenal function.

other_tests.findings: A novel tryptophan to cysteine missense mutation (W105C) in the amino-terminal region of DAX1 was identified.
Abnormal aldosterone (0.14 nmol/liter) and cortisol levels in certain age appearances; overall hormonal levels suggest adrenal functional challenges.
Below detection levels for sodium after a salt-restricted diet.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normal sodium level preserved post-diet interventions.
